member.name: M:StorageHelper.Mango.Storage.DeleteState(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the element with the specified key from the application's state.
member.param: The key of the element to remove.
member.returns: True if the key has been removed or did not exist.

member.name: M:StorageHelper.Mango.Storage.SaveState(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Saves an element with the provided key and value to the application's state.
member.param: The key of the element to save.
member.returns: True if the element has been saved.

member.name: M:StorageHelper.Mango.Storage.LoadState``1(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the value associated with the specified key from the application's state.
member.typeparam: The type of the object at the specified key.
member.param: The key of the element to retrieve.
member.returns: The retrieved element or an empty object of type T if no element was found at the specified key.

member.name: M:StorageHelper.Mango.Storage.Delete(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the entry with the specified key from the application's persisted storage.
member.param: The key for the entry to be deleted.
member.returns: True if the entry has been removed.

member.name: M:StorageHelper.Mango.Storage.Save(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Saves an entry with the provided key and value to the application's persisted storage.
member.param: The key for the entry to save.
member.returns: True if the entry has been saved.

member.name: M:StorageHelper.Mango.Storage.Load``1(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the value associated with the specified key from the application's persisted storage.
member.typeparam: The type of the object at the specified key.
member.param: The key for the entry to retrieve.
member.returns: The retrieved element or an empty object of type T if no entry was found at the specified key.
